content: {"name": "Atonement  Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "**Use the Plentiful app to  schedule an appointment as the schedule may vary if there's a church event**\nPantry is open on Friday but you need to create an appointment on the plentiful app to see which days are open.", "email": "", "url": "atonementbronx.org", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1344 Beach Avenue ", "address_2": "", "city": "Bronx  ", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10472", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.833351, "longitude": -73.866241}, "phones": [{"number": "(347) 841-3765", "type": "voice"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Needs volunteers"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Schedule appointment through PLENTIFUL app"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: twice a month"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers upon availability"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clothing may be available"}]}
